java/liquibase/change/DropSequenceChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropSequenceStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Sequence;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.Arrays;
00015 import java.util.HashSet;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class DropSequenceChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private String schemaName;
00024     private String sequenceName;
00025 
00026     public DropSequenceChange() {
00027         super("dropSequence", "Drop Sequence");
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getSequenceName() {
00039         return sequenceName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setSequenceName(String sequenceName) {
00043         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00047         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(sequenceName) == null) {
00048             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("sequenceName is required", this);
00049         }
00050 
00051     }
00052 
00053     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00054         return new SqlStatement[]{new DropSequenceStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getSequenceName())};
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00058         return "Sequence " + getSequenceName() + " dropped";
00059     }
00060 
00061     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00062         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropSequence");
00063         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00064             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00065         }
00066         element.setAttribute("sequenceName", getSequenceName());
00067 
00068         return element;
00069     }
00070 
00071     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00072         Sequence dbObject = new Sequence();
00073         dbObject.setName(sequenceName);
00074 
00075         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00076     }
00077 }
